mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REF_BNO, WRITER_NICKNAME, REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{replyNo}, #{refBno}, #{writerNickname}, #{replyContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, WRITER_NICKNAME writerNickname, REPLY_CONTENT replyContent, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate FROM TB_REPLY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{refBno} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
